graph_title: Number of municipal institutions carrying out a Common Good Balance in Treptow-Köpenick
indicator_name: Number of municipal institutions carrying out a Common Good Balance in Treptow-Köpenick
source_organisation_1: International Federation for the Economy for the Common Good e.V.
target_name: Measure - Public welfare certification for an office of the district office Treptow-Köpenick
page_content: The indicator shows how many companies in Treptow-Köpenick have a valid certificate of a common good balance sheet in each year.
